pages.text: An la que yi tingqu wei zhangfu er xiang ni biansu, bing xiang an la suku zhe de chenshule. An la tingzhe ni lia de bianlun; an la que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de

Nimen zhong ba qi shi dang muqin de renmen, tamen bushi tamen de muqin; chu tamen de shengshen zhi mu wai, meiyou renhe ren, keyi cheng wei tamen de muqin; tamen dique shuo chu e yan he huanghua; an la que shi zhi you de, que shi zhi she de
Ba qizi dangzuo muqin ranhou hui qi suo yan zhe, zai jiaojie zhiqian, yinggai shifang yige nuli. Na shi yong lai quangao nimen de, an la shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de

Meiyou nuli zhe, zai jiaojie zhiqian, yinggai lianxu zhaijie liang yue. Buneng zhaijie zhe, yinggai gongji liushi ge pinmin yi ri de kouliang. Zhe yinwei yao nimen biaoshi xinyang an la he shizhe. Zhexie shi an la de fadu. Buxindao de renmen, jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Weikang an la he shizhe de ren, bi zao zhemo, youru tamen yiqian de ren ceng zao zhemo yiyang. Wo que yi jiang shi xuduo mingzheng, bu xin zhe, jiang shou lingru de xingfa
Zai na ri, an la jiang shi tamen tongtong dou fuhuo, er jiang tamen shengqian de xingwei gaosu tamen. An la ceng jilu naxie xingwei, tamen que wangle ta. An la shi jianzheng wanwu de
